constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 22 (Friday, February 5, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SMITH of New Jersey:
H.R. 18.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The constitutional authority on which this bill is based is
Congress's power under the Spending Clause in Article I,
Section 8 of the Constitution.
[Page H469]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

title: No Taxpayer Funding for Abortion and Abortion Insurance Full Disclosure Act of 2021
